nodes.text: The Chandrila Orbital Station was a space station that orbited the planet Chandrila during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Located in the Chandrila system in the Bormea sector, the station was host to a raid during the Battle of the Red Reaper where it was defended by the Chandrilan security forces.
The Chandrila Orbital Station was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011.
